com.maxmind.geoip2.exception

Class GeoIp2Exception

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.maxmind.geoip2.exception.GeoIp2Exception
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddressNotFoundException, AuthenticationException, InvalidRequestException, OutOfQueriesException

    public class GeoIp2Exception
extends java.lang.Exception
    This class represents a generic GeoIP2 error. All other exceptions thrown by the GeoIP2 API subclass this exception
    See Also:
